keycard_redacted.name: Administrator Card
keycard_redacted.description: A ghost card that is incredibly rare in the Foundation's database. It is said to belong to the Administrator; its origin and full functionality are unknown, but it is believed to provide stealth control over all systems, bypassing any security protocols.

keycard_o5.name: O5 Council Card
keycard_o5.description: Provides full and unrestricted access to all facility systems. Possession of this card without proper authorization is an act of treason and is punishable by immediate termination.

keycard_zone_director.name: Zone Director Card
keycard_zone_director.description: Issued exclusively to the head of the facility. Provides access to administrative sectors, control centers, and object containment chambers, and also allows for the initiation of zone lockdown protocols.

keycard_captain_mog.name: MTF Captain Card
keycard_captain_mog.description: Card of the Mobile Task Force unit commander. Provides full access to armories and allows coordination of squad actions through secure communication channels.

keycard_lieutenant_mog.name: MTF Lieutenant Card
keycard_lieutenant_mog.description: Issued to deputy commanders and MTF squad leaders. Provides tactical access to most areas of the facility.

keycard_sergeant_mog.name: MTF Sergeant Card
keycard_sergeant_mog.description: Standard card for sergeants and experienced MTF operatives. Provides access to the main nodes of the facility for combat missions.

keycard_security.name: Security Service Card
keycard_security.description: Basic card for facility security personnel. Allows patrolling of facility zones.

keycard_zone_manager.name: Zone Manager Card
keycard_zone_manager.description: Card for mid-level managers and managers of individual zones. Provides extended access to offices, laboratories, and control points within their area of responsibility.

keycard_engineering.name: Containment Engineer Card
keycard_engineering.description: Issued to engineering and technical personnel. Provides access to the life support systems of containment chambers, Tesla gate control panels, and service tunnels.

keycard_major_scientist.name: Senior Scientist Card
keycard_major_scientist.description: Issued to research project leaders and leading scientists. Provides access to most object containment chambers and restricted access laboratories.

keycard_scientist.name: Scientist Card
keycard_scientist.description: Standard card for scientific personnel. Provides access to laboratories, offices, and some object containment chambers.

keycard_janitor.name: Janitorial Staff Card
keycard_janitor.description: Card with minimal clearance level. Issued to janitorial staff for access to utility rooms and, upon order, to D-class chambers for... 'sanitary work'.
